title: University​ Collaboration organised​ by​ Nokia​ Bangalore​
description:
University​ Collaboration​ is​ an​ annual​ event​ organised​ by​ Nokia​ Bangalore​ to​ strengthen​ the Industry-Academic​ Collaboration.​ This​ year​ it​ was​ held​ on​ October​ 13th​ in​ the​ Nokia​ Campus, Bangalore.​ Nokia​ has​ been​ hosting​ the​ industrial​ visit​ for​ students​ as​ part​ of​ the​ IEEE​ Elevate series.

IEEE-NITK​ was​ represented​ by​ Subbalakshmi​ Narayan​ and​ Samarth​ Bonthala​ who​ presented​ the project​
​ .They​ also​ got​ the​ opportunity​ to​ visit​ the Research​ Laboratories​ at​ Nokia​ and​ interact​ with​ the​ industrial​ leaders.
